title: Reinforcement Learning: Overview

definitions.Passive Reinforcement Learning: how to learn from already given experiences
definitions.Model-based: learn the MDP model from experiences, then solve the MDP
definitions.Model-free: forego learning the MDP model, directly learn V or Q
definitions.Value learning: learns value of a fixed policy
definitions.Q learning: learns Q values of the optimal policy (Q version of TD Learning)

summary: The slide provides an overview of Reinforcement Learning, discussing Passive Reinforcement Learning, Model-based and Model-free approaches, Value learning, Q learning, Active Reinforcement Learning, and Approximate Reinforcement Learning.
